abstract.text: A request that classifies sound using a Core ML model.

inlineContent.text: For more information about creating and using classify sound requests, see:

abstract.text: Classify various sounds by analyzing audio files or streams.
An analyzer that runs sound classification requests on an audio file.
An object you create to analyze a stream of audio data and provide the results to your app.
A result that contains the highest-ranking classifications in a time range.
An identifier that represents the versions of the framework’s sound classifier.
A request that classifies sound using a Core ML model.
Creates a request that uses the framework’s built-in sound classification model.
Creates a request that uses a custom sound classification model.
A string array that contains every prediction label in the request’s underlying sound classifier model.
The amount of overlap between successive analysis windows when the model operates on a fixed-size audio block.
The duration of the audio buffer the request sends to the underlying sound classifier for each prediction.
A range or list of sound duration times the request’s underlying sound classifier supports.
A range or list of sound duration times the request’s underlying sound classifier supports.
A protocol that represents sound analysis requests.
Defines the time duration windows the request’s underlying sound classifier accepts with a range, or an array, of durations.
Defines the time duration windows the request’s underlying sound classifier accepts with a range, or an array, of durations.
Detect and identify hundreds of sounds by using a trained classifier.

doc://com.apple.soundanalysis/documentat.title: Classifying Live Audio Input with a Built-in Sound Classifier

abstract.text: Identify individual sounds in a file, such as a recording, with an audio file analyzer.

doc://com.apple.soundanalysis/documentat.title: Classifying Sounds in an Audio File

abstract.text: Identify individual sounds in an audio data stream, such as from a microphone, with an audio stream analyzer.

doc://com.apple.soundanalysis/documentat.title: Classifying Sounds in an Audio Stream

abstract.text: The root class of most Objective-C class hierarchies, from which subclasses inherit a basic interface to the runtime system and the ability to behave as Objective-C objects.
The group of methods that are fundamental to all Objective-C objects.
A type that can be hashed into a `Hasher` to produce an integer hash value.
A type that can be compared for value equality.
A type with a customized textual representation.
A type with a customized textual representation suitable for debugging purposes.
A type whose instances can be encoded, and appropriately passed, as elements of a C `va_list`.
